title: MOOC Learning Design for Digital-Based Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Asynchronous online learning for professional development in language education within a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can develop a self-directed learning plan for language proficiency enhancement using digital platforms.
Learners can share practical language-related knowledge through collaborative learning activities in a MOOC (Massive Open Online Course) environment.
Learners can evaluate and improve language learning outcomes using digital tools (apps, blogs, etc.).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
